12:51:13e7468107db32581002085bd05b9619780nathalia.zago@alparservice.com.br2020-08-27 12:51:13workflow.scratchpad.children = []; var entity = current.sys_id.toString(); var type = current.type.toString(); // Verifica se foi update e se sim, se teve alteração de tipo e layer // If type cheanged, disable controls if (type && workflow.variables.u_old_type && type != workflow.variables.u_old_type) { // Insert control var grOldControl = new GlideRecord("x_anbib_grc_control"); grOldControl.addQuery("entity", entity); grOldControl.addQuery("layer.entity_type", workflow.variables.u_old_type); grOldControl.state = "8"; // disabled - type changed grOldControl.active = false; grOldControl.updateMultiple(); } updateEntityControls(entity, type); function updateEntityControls(entity, type) { var grEntityLayer = new GlideRecord("x_anbib_grc_m2m_entities_layer_controls"); grEntityLayer.addQuery("entity", entity); grEntityLayer.query(); while (grEntityLayer.next()) { var layer = grEntityLayer.layer_control.toString(); var grLayerControlTpl = new GlideRecord("x_anbib_grc_m2m_control_temp_layer_contro"); grLayerControlTpl.addQuery("layer_control", layer); grLayerControlTpl.query(); while (grLayerControlTpl.next()) { var template = grLayerControlTpl.control_template.toString(); // Insert control var grControl = new GlideRecord("x_anbib_grc_control"); grControl.addQuery("entity", entity); grControl.addQuery("control", template); grControl.addQuery("layer", layer); grControl.addQuery("layer.entity_type", type); grControl.query(); if (!grControl.next()) { // Add control definition to array // workflow.scratchpad.controls.push({ // u_entity: entity, // u_control: template, // u_layer: layer // }); grControl.initialize(); grControl.entity = entity; grControl.control = template; grControl.layer = layer; grControl.state = "0"; grControl.frequency = grLayerControlTpl.frequency; grControl.period = grLayerControlTpl.period; grControl.period_unit = grLayerControlTpl.period_unit; var control_sys_id = grControl.insert(); // inserted control sys_id var grControlInsert = new GlideRecord('x_anbib_grc_control'); grControlInsert.get(control_sys_id); // inserted control record var wf = new global.Workflow(); var thisEntityFlows = wf.getRunningFlows(current); // Opened flows for entity var thisContext = ""; while(thisEntityFlows.next()) { thisContext = thisEntityFlows.getUniqueValue(); } // Parametros para subflow var inputs = { u_fatherwkf: thisContext, u_record: current.sys_id.toString() }; var wf_sys_id = wf.startFlow(gs.getProperty("x_anbib_grc.workflow_control"), grControlInsert, "insert", inputs); workflow.scratchpad.children.push({ record: control_sys_id, childWKF: wf_sys_id, status: "running" }); } else { if (!grControl.active) { grControl.active = true; grControl.state = "1"; // review grControl.update(); } } } } }c35ddef20a0a0ba96248a7090eccd518wf_activity67468107db32581002085bd05b9619781sys_variable_valuenathalia.zago@alparservice.com.br2020-08-27
